data.message: how do badge verification in my profile !?

replies.message: Hey Max. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2e8TcRL. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2e8TOXJ.  Thank you. -Hannah
